name: Marie Lee
text: Good food! pizza was awesome and fried chicken was juicy! pretty awesome! place wasn't packed and the atmosphere was very welcoming.

name: Nikki Arakawa
text: Went for the lunch buffet. There were a lot of people but rarely any pizza on the buffet. So next time if i go I'll just order a pizza. The pizza was awesome but if there isnt any pizza whats the point.

name: ScarecrowHobo
text: It was a great place to host parties and celebrations, making memories and happy moments for everyone; the service was genuine, people were happy. Its a shame we have to see Shakeys Pizza go. We will forever miss you, our regards - Everyone

name: Heather Knightson
text: My number one complaint is the unsanitary reuse of plates here.  Buffets are supposed to provide a clean plate every time; you have to ask here,  and so people were just reusing plates,  touching serving utensils to used dirty plates, â€¦More

name: Zx2Nick
text: I didn't like the pizza. Parts of it was undercooked. The place is large good enough to host a party for several families. Most of the employees were really nice but one in particular (cashier) needs an attitude adjustment.

name: Christian Cubacub
text: The food tastes pretty good, but the things are pricey... especially drinks! The service is alright, waiting times can be long. The seating area atmosphere is unique but crowded. It's always loud to due to the arcade.  I think it's a great place to bring friends and family.

name: Jamie Grilho
text: Do not waste your time and money going to this place. The food is absolutely horrible, as well as the service. Today was the first and last time I will patron this establishment. Myself and other friends arrived at the peak lunch hour and â€¦More

name: K Ballou
text: We love this place! Good food, we always get chicken strips and mojos with our pizza. The game is on, the kids can play games. Win win for everyone! UPDATE: they've closed and it's now a Round Table Pizza joint.

name: smytb
text:
Most Excellent Food!
Delicious Pizzas, and Fried chicken and Mo-Jo Potatoes!
OnoLicuous Grinds! Bring the whole Family foe a GREAT Meal! !!

name: Valery Nomura
text: I went to the Waipahu location with friends the other week.  It's like how I remembered the Kaneohe location a long time ago.   They have really good specials.   Wish they had one closer to town!  Yum!  I will be back.    It looks like a good place for a kids party... or sports teams....etc.

name: Maurice Arreola
text: Good food decent family meal deals.  plenty of seating free refills on drinks and nice staff. A lot of TVs to for sports and not crowded. Very cool place

name: Amanda Fetaui
text: I think Shakey's is alright. It's not comparable to Chuck Cheese though. I gave it a 3 stars being that it never fails to give my kids a good time even with the small selection of games. It also entertains my husband when they have a game â€¦More

name: Leina Richardson
text: Very very disappointed... the pizza is high-priced  and The Taste is meh... the establishment itself has an irie vibe.. they only have a few games for the kids and majority of them are out of service or not working.... the chicken wings are â€¦More

name: Biko Biko
text: Shakey's Pizza good high quality Pizza.  A pizza eating experience that has gone the way of the dinosaur, really when was the last time you sat down in a restaurant eating a slice of pizza, the games on the screen the kids are playing video â€¦More

name: the DUDE
text: Friendly people, decent food, but the buffet was a little cold and sparse..

name: brenden toyofuku
text: Other than having alcohol and TVs... you're better off going to chuck e cheese

name: Carl H
text: Really liked this place!  Would definitely come back again to have the buffet!

name: Christina Garza
text: Mojos are great but customer service seems to lack unless you have a large party...

name: james clinkscales
text: Shakeys was in Texas in the 60s and 70s. I have never found a place like it.  I just discovered that there is one in Honolulu.. Our trip to the islands in this spring is now  complete.  YES..

name: LINDY BAUER
text: Very nice people they mixed up our order with a different table but that was ok, it was very packed.  We got to play in the arcade and the kids even got 4 times as many mini hamburger candies as they asked for. I recommend this place very good food, nice people.

name: Kaneokamehaikana Lee
text: Hated it, I stood up and ate all night.  There is not enough room to seat everyone.  I swear half of the room had reserved  signs on them and no one sat down throughout our stay there which was a total of three hours.  The food is okay and it's expensive.  Blah, anyone can fry chicken.  The pizza is worse than Digiornio frozen pizzas.

name: Laweo
text: Loved it. Taste and cost, great value

name: keoni keopuhiwa
text: This is the spot in all waipahu great food great customer service from all especially Matt who came numerous times to check up on us!!!

name: Bill R
text: I am so happy Shakey's came back to Hawaii. I use to work at the Kaneohe Shakey's in the late 1970's. Nothing is better than a pizza cooked in a traditional oven.

name: jromo808
text: Great place to eat, food was good. But why charge. 75 cents for extra ranch. Spent 100 for the meals and can't get a complementry sauce.

name: Manny Ganir
text: Disappointing,  games for kids are mostly broken.  Alot of the furniture torn.

name: Kyle J. Camacho
text: Great restaurant! Service was decent not the best, but overall it's a nice and clean enviornment. Great place for family dinners. Kids can enjoy the arcade, and they have the best pizza I've ever had.

name: Shanel Shelton
text: Love this pizza and chicken the best yet gets busy at times.

name: Tony Valle
text: Pizza is of the hook!!! With fried chicken aannd mojo potatos???? Definantly would come back!

name: Nathan Enriques
text: Great All You Can Eat! Best Deal!

name: Mark Larson
text: Great food, friendly staff and happy place.

name: Shawn Thomsen
text: It was over all good. Nothing to complain about because I had the buffet. If I ordered then might be different.

name: Ria Deveza
text: Food is fresh but it's too salty for me. I loved every bite of it but it's not something I can eat every day. It brought memories from waaaay back ðŸ˜Š

name: HMbaram
text: This place is horrible!!!!!!!!! My friend and I went here with our kids and they had nothing ready and the pizza that was ready for the buffet was so nasty. The salad bar is a joke and it's very difficult to get anything from the salad bar. You're better off going to the pizza Hut buffet that much further from this place.

name: Marissa cruz
text: Food was good but ambiance was not a good experience. I hope they renovate to maintain cleanliness and the comfy feeling while you dine.

name: Roger Blatchford
text: Best buffet on island. Pizza is artisan and a creative selection to choose from.

name: Sandra Hashida
text: Great place to take the grandkids!  While we enjoy pizza, chicken and beer, the kids can play in the arcade.

name: D
text: good pizza, games for the kids n THEY SERVE BEER

name: Misty Chong
text: Love the Lunch buffet, pizzas, pasta, garlic bread, mojos, salad bar. Rustic garlic chicken pizza is one of my faves. There's a game room for children and serves some types of alcohol for adults.

name: Jill Lagon
text: Great food!

name: P. Stauffer
text: Clean place, good service, moderate price.  However, my pie was greasy.

name: Graded New or Forgotten Collectibles
text: Need a ATM in the building, walking down the street to the bank for cash, so the kids can play games is dumb. What's the point of having games if you don't have an ATM machine. Food is great though....

name: Carlos Salas
text:
Great food,Service an atmosphere....
Mahalo

name: Richard Darling
text: Good food and family atmosphere

name: Matt Anderson
text: The people calling this food excellent are either smoking crack, have no taste buds, or consider totino's frozen pizzas to be fine dining. The pizza isn't bad and was fairly tasty compared to a chuck-e-cheese or showbiz pizza and I'd eat it â€¦More

name: Jes Acosta
text: Nice place for Family fun. Lots of tv for sports nuts..  beer,salad,chx,potato wedges and pizza

name: Jean P
text: (Update) very sad ðŸ˜­to see you close for good, love your pizza and your staff was awsome to me, pls reconsider opening in Hawaii again, maybe a new location (Honolulu), if not thank you for the great times I had there, you will be missedðŸ˜¢, â€¦More

name: Amy Litherland
text: Fried chicken delish!  Prefer thin crust to thick but tasty!

name: Kira Conte
text: I've been meaning to try this place out for a while.   We drove by it a while ago and saw that they had a lunch buffet for only $10.99 so we thought it was kind of like CeCe's or something.  It's not. â€¦More

name: Douglas Maguire
text: Great People & Awesome Pizza - best on the island

name: Jerry Howell
text: good pizza and chicken their mojo potatoes are good too as well I think it's better than a lot of other pizza places prices are not that bad

name: Starnani Lynch
text: I love here best pizza ever...

name: Luis Linares
text: Aloha,my experience with  shakey''s pizza for most part has been great, as a army enlisted,  discount was great for my family,  now after 25 yrs  service,served  my country,  retired,  now noooooo!!!! discount!!!! Come on l'll never go back,aloha,  not right!

name: Rob Palevac
text: Great quality food for a good price with a wonderful, albeit usually loud atmosphere that is suited for a date or fun for the family. Beer on tap is icing on the cake.

name: Mark Broome
text: Great pizza and fun for everyone.

name: Jamie Reece
text: Great food, nice staff, games for the kids.

name: Diana Halemano
text: It's a good place for families to go to food is good

name: Keiko Williams
text: Good pizza & big space and relaxing

name: Clark Smith
text: Best pizza in Hawaii !!!!! An fun for da keiki

name: JonPaul Bockman
text: Good pizza!

name: Jerry Shafer
text: Not impressed, all you can eat pizza, pasta and salad but there was no pizza or pasta, demand was far ahead of the kitchen and the place had less then 40 people.

name: Rick Bernico
text: Absolutely love their pizza

name: Iwalani Shea
text: Pizza combo was good, only thing wrong the game room wasn't open. My granddaughters wanted to play on the machines.

name: Brandon Henderson
text: Pizzas always good.but it's a little pricey

name: Linda Yanagihara
text: Great food!

name: Love Forever
text: Please I like to reviews

name: jahfunny
text: Best pizza!

name: Michael Martin
text: Pizza and mojos!!!

name: Marcus Alcayde
text: Worse service ever had making one party at this place, never ever make party to this place again, foods are not bad.

name: Monica Jones
text: Great place for a fam night out!!
